text: Charles Oscar Finley (February 22, 1918 - February 19, 1996), nicknamed Charlie O or Charley O, was an American businessman. He was the owner of the Oakland Athletics of Major League Baseball team. == Other websites == *Baseball Hall of Fame candidate profile *BaseballLibrary - profile and career highlights Category:Businesspeople from Indiana Category:Baseball executives Category:People from Gary, Indiana Category:Oakland Athletics Category:1918 births Category:1996 deaths
title: Charles O. Finley
